jump_scares.spoiler: A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah
The same teenage boy is suddenly stabbed all the way from the back of his head and out through his eye socket, pushing his eyeball out
Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward
Tom turns around in the cage only to be face to face with the killer
Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley
The lights in the grocery store abruptly and loudly turn off
The pick-axe goes through the door missing Sarah’s face by a hair
Harry Ward suddenly appears at the window
Ex-Sheriff Burke suddenly bangs on the car window
The deputy opens the bloodied dryer door and a steaming, grotesque head falls out
Ex-Sheriff Burke turns around and is immediately stabbed by Harry Ward
Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head
